title: Star Guardian Ahri release date?
body: I'm just wondering when the skins will be released I heard a lot of people say it will be released September 7th? The splash art is already in game and rito is making it come out two weeks later but i still don't know if it's true so im asking for more clarification. {{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

replies.body:
Riot has a tendency to include skins in new patches but release them at a later date which IS what they are doing with the new SG skins.
They will either be released before or the day of the event.
Also {{champion:16}} is my favorite!

or you can read when they said they would release it which is september 7th
https://twitter.com/KateyAnthony/status/900019149119684609
September 7th doesn't really make sense. That's the END of this patch. Perhaps they meant something else?

> [{quoted}](name=SinfulDesire,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=3wT0N5Qy,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2017-08-25T08:55:27.593+0000)
>
> September 7th doesn't really make sense. That's the END of this patch. Perhaps they meant something else?

This patch is going to be longer than normal patches because the next patch is the worlds patch, which probably means they are delaying the release of the skins to space out the content of the patch.

So yeah, thank worlds for the pointless skin delay of 2 weeks. :)
Oh D:! Damn, yeah that's pretty dumb. :c Why even put the splashes in and get everyone hyped just to wait 2 weeks. Man I hate that. <\3 Thanks for letting me know though.
also that picture is a link to the twitter idk why it put a picture though
Yeah I read the post. I'm so disappointed. Oh well. :c

> [{quoted}](name=Daddy Issues,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=3wT0N5Qy,comment-id=0000000000000000,timestamp=2017-08-25T10:13:00.604+0000)
>
> This patch is going to be longer than normal patches because the next patch is the worlds patch, which probably means they are delaying the release of the skins to space out the content of the patch.
> 
> So yeah, thank worlds for the pointless skin delay of 2 weeks. :)

Well, at least I can say I'm not surprised.
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}
because there's a 3 week gap between 7.17 and 7.18 (worlds patch)
I did read, thanks.

> [{quoted}](name=Teapup,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=3wT0N5Qy,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-08-25T03:00:29.097+0000)
>
> Riot has a tendency to include skins in new patches but release them at a later date which IS what they are doing with the new SG skins.
> They will either be released before or the day of the event.
> Also {{champion:16}} is my favorite!

Thanks a Million!!

I just wish they came out today;-; 2 weeks seems like a long time to wait for mamma Ahri to come. Like I'm dying right now. {{champion:103}} {{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}  I need to have all the skins for Ahri, so waiting all this time is torture for me
2 weeks? they said "this patch" ...should be out since wedness day 1 week after patch...dont tell me it'll come out with the new game mode....if so why they included it on this patch ? rito#

Right, sigh

{{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}

Hey , does anyone know if Riot are doing a Star Guardian bundle for these new skins like the previous ones ? If so what's included and how much ? 

Thanks ðŸ˜Š
Why is Ezreal the only guy among the girls?

well, because he's heavily inspired by the "magical boy" version of the "magical girl" genre

anime like this include Cute High Earth Defense Club Love! (basically the same thing as girls but the ones doing the protecting of earth are boys)

Though that one is more of a joke since they are wearing the girly outfits xD

Ezreal's took more inspiration from Galactic Pretty Boy outfits of Star Driver.
his outfit was more influenced by the Galactic Pretty Boy outfit while the skin in general was inspired by Cute High Earth Defense Club so you're not wrong

the only guy? where?
I dont see any guy...
"#"ezrealisagirl
THEY COME OUT 11:AM PT OR 2:00 PM FOR EST FINALLY!!!
Omg thank you, it hurts more to not know what time to wait for {{sticker:katarina-love}}
Fucking hell can't wait.

For me, it's currently 10:10 PM 9/7/2017 - logged on to see a giant star guardian artwork. Immediately went to the store to check for the new waifus, yes this includes Ezreal. They weren't there. Will they be there in the next hour or two? I guess we'll have to wait and see.

Does someone knows if there will be a free icon? Or an icon from a LoL quiz like the last time?
Honestly I don't want to spend a lot of money {{champion:32}} {{item:3070}}
no  comment

I kinda hate the fact that they leave the splash art in game and then say nothing about the skins until they finally come out about 1 or 2 weeks later. Report rito for that, i got ultra hyped when i saw {{champion:103}} splash
Welp I just hope i don t have to wait tooo much before Rito takes my money (BTW sg Ahri is the best one {{champion:103}} )
i would like them to use this extra time to add some vo to the sg skins of 1350p worth. {{champion:21}}

> [{quoted}](name=Moonwizard88,realm=EUW,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=3wT0N5Qy,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2017-08-27T10:02:17.141+0000)
>
> i would like them to use this extra time to add some vo to the sg skins of 1350p worth. {{champion:21}}

There won't be any changes. The skins are in the patch, and won't be touched for the same reason Kayn won't be enabled in Blood Moon.
Awwww Im waiting every day, every hour, every MINUTE for next skin of my true love - {{champion:103}}  ... give it to me ! >_>
